name: East Coast Hip Hop
description: Highly influential Hip Hop scene that developed in New York City, particularly in the South Bronx, during the 1970s.

children.name: Bronx Drill
children.description: Bronx scene that popularized Sample Drill and aggressive New York Drill delivery and production in the early 2020s.

children.name: Brooklyn Drill
children.description: Brooklyn scene that kickstarted New York Drill in the mid-2010s, primarily through adopted UK Drill production.
